title: Grilled salmon and scallop kebab
description: Take kebabs to another level with this seafood skewer with a garlic and chilli dipping sauce, homemade naan and mint raita.Equipment and preparation: You will need four wooden skewers, soaked in water for an hour.
ingredients: 250g/9oz salmon fillet, skinned and cut into 2cm/1in pieces
500g/1lb 2oz plain flour, plus extra for rolling
¼ root fresh turmeric, peeled and grated
